reviews.review: Lo jugué seguido del primero original, soy de los que prefieren las primeras ediciones/versiones. Para quien le guste las mejoras gráficas compren este, gran cambio gráfico, y bueno, en cuanto al videojuego, es el Half-Life, no es necesario agregar nada más.

Half-life source o mejor dicho Half-life con agua transparente. Este juego es una basura si de innovación se trata, lo único que cambia a Half-life 1 son: los ragdolls, la reflexión de las armas, el agua y nada más.  si realmente quieres algo diferente a half-life 1 ahorra para comprar Black mesa que para ser de un estudio emergente es bastante mejor de lo que salio de la casa creadora, yo lo compré porque no sabia que hacer con esos 4.400 xD.

so this is half-life but on the source engine simple right? no. theres a lot of bugs! for example the mp5 does way too much damage and even though it sounds like a good thing the enemie soldiers have the same gun and it makes fights A LOT harder. also weapons are way too shiny. you should buy the original half-life and not this!

Uno de los mejores juegos que e probado. Al ser tan antiguo tranquilamente puede ser usado en cualquier pc y pese a ese detalle sigue siendo un juego que se conserva a pesar de tantos años. su historia sigue siendo interesante y se puede seguir disfrutando a pesar de ya haberlo pasado una vez. Valve inicia con esa entrega y consigue crear una de las mejores sagas que hasta dia de hoy sigue siendo impresionante desde esta entrega hasta alyx. Recomendado al 100% si no tienes una computadora potente  deseas pasar por un buen rato y si deseas dificultad tambien lo tienes.

To begin with... why was this even made?
Original Half-Life is thousand times better and 
this one is broken at some parts of the game...

Not worth the money (8€ at the time of writing this) for a game 
that only has shiny weapons, shiny water... 
Some security guards can't die and shoot insanely fast, 
some doctors are glitched and won't follow or they make sounds 
of being hurt just randomly.. some chapters have weird graphical
glitches...

Get the original Half-Life or awesome remake Black Mesa!
I don't suggest you to buy this, only if you want it in your collection...

Я не понимаю почему люди обсирают эту игру, но да там освещение текстурки розовые и всё такое.Но можно всё исправить с помощью консоли, к тому же мне сама халф лайф сорс понравилась,  с рагдолами, ещё закачал мод на эту игру тип графика крутая, и там всё нормально, все некоторые недочёты с освещение и квадратами рыготы мамки хедкрабов, можно исправить. Но я ожидал чтото большего типо на подобие блек мезы но всё же это одна и таже игра только с доробтками.

It's pretty good but the guns and some props look TOO shiny.

Pros:

- It's Half-Life
- You can select a chapter from the menu
- You get Half-Life 1 Stuff in Garry's Mod

Cons:

- Other than the graphics nothing else has changed
- The graphics actually looks worse
- It has more glitches 
- There is no remake of Opposing Force/Blue Shift
- You cannot use GoldSrc mods
- You need to configure it just for custom maps
- It suffers from a lot of glitches (but there is a mod you can get to fix it: https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-source-fixed )

3/10: Just get the original or Black Mesa

horrible bugs and glitches that can really hurt your eyes, and if you are epilepsy prone, watch out. The textures causes weird neon green flashing lights that happen usually as stripes of neon green and black that constantly flash you out of no where for no reason. It is a shame that i was not able to finish the game because my eyes are incredibly sensitive to bright flashing lights, especially when they are out of nowhere and are uncalled for. Anyways, stay away from the "source" version of the game, its full of bugs that sometimes makes the game damn near unplayable. If you can, get the "OG" half life from 1998, its the same thing except not shitty and full of bugs.

Esta versión es tan mala que le dan ganas a uno de matar a los científicos y a los guardias, tal vez porque son más feos o porque no mueren de una forma tan grotesca como en el original que sí da pesar matarlos :(
There are a few glitches but overall its pretty damn good.

This game is good. Easier than the original but the graphics can glitch, I suggest using Non-HD textures when playing. Not sure if that fixes it but the graphical glitches are on the safe side and won't ruin the game. The Treadmill room and the Snipers Den/ Mine field outside area are the only spots where the textures mess up. The game is overall easy and I've little trouble killing enemies that were a pain in the original like those female assassins.

This games reviews are plagued with Bad/Not Recommended reviews, however there aren't really alot of posts with reasons why.
I'l go over some of the pros and cons of this game.

Pros
-The Water in the game looks 100x better and is really good.
-Animated Backgrounds on the menu.

Cons
-The game is really buggy, I'm guessing Valve legit just ported The Original HL1 into Source Engine and ended up going with whatever floated their boat.
-Doctors randomly make the "OUCH" sound at random, or if hit once and constantly will make the sound
-Weapons are extremly shiny.
-Its possible to somehow see the void even if you are inside the area

For what HL1S is. I see Valves Intentions weren't to make a quick buck, but to give a revised version of the game, they wont bother updating the game anymore.
If I was you. Go with Something like the Original Half-Life, or go with Black Mesa.
Half-Bugs

The only reason I bought this game is to tell you to stay away from it and to play the original instead. Either that or Black Mesa (or both, why not); that's a much better Source engine version of the game.

Just verify the integrity of game files and problem solved! Thank you valve team but you ruined the orijinal game with none sense add ons...

... I know that even on release fans were disappointed by how lazy this game was (which is how black mesa began iirc).

Just... Don't buy it, and if you get it through the valve complete pack then don't waste your time on it. This is just a very very lazy port of Half-Life to a very very old source engine. Result is a very very buggy mess that is broken. I mean... it *is* playable but like... ai is just broken (I know for a fact the soldier ai isn't supposed to be this hard), some code is fucked (example: vorts don't charge their attack faster on hard) and the map dimensions are all wrong (you jump slightly higher as a result).

If you want to play Half-Life but the original game is a little out of date for you then you have two options.
1) Black Mesa: A reimagination of the classic game from 1998 (note that it is a reimagining and not a "remaster"). It is available on steam for purchase and it is much longer than the original game.
2) Brutal Half-Life (Mod): This would fall into the remaster category, adding more effects, the ability to ADS, more guns, better textures and sounds, etc...

Portal1&2がすごく気に入ったので、元ネタとなるこのゲームを購入。
日本語対応とあるものの、MODを入れないとNPCのアナウンスや会話は字幕が付かない。
コントローラーには対応しているけど無理やりエミュレートしているのか、キーコンフィグをいじると意図しない部分まで変更されてしまう。
歩く動作などはキーコンフィグを変更しないとできなかったり、前述の勝手にボタン設定が変わるせいで、割り当てたい機能が足せなかったり不親切な設計。
HPとアーマーという感じで自キャラの体力は２系統あるものの、被ダメが痛すぎてすぐ瀕死になる。
天井に張り付いた敵に持ち上げられて落下ダメージで死亡、ハシゴ操作にクセがあり落下ダメージで死亡、思わぬ段差から落ちて落下ダメージで死亡、等々のつまらない死に方が多い。
グラフィックが向上しているとは言うもののやはり９０年代の洋ゲーという感じだったので半分ぐらいまで進んだ所でやめた。
